name: react-swipe-load
description: react-swipe-load, support down swipe refresh & up swipe load more data

scripts.compile: rimraf lib && babel src --out-dir lib && copyfiles -u 1 ./src/**/*.less ./lib
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.fastpush: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'build' && git push origin daily/1.0.0

author: Shaozhenjiang<814184517@qq.com>
